results.title: Electricity and heat
results.creator_credit: Langton Gould-Marks, Frank A. Hoare and Merton Park
results.brief_description: The heating effect of an electric current is shown to be a clue to agitation of the aubital electrons; the difference between series and modern applications of electric heating are demonstrated.

results.title: Squirrel-cage rotor principles
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Electrical work: electrical machinery”.
Laws of magnetism and induced electromagnetic fields.; electric flow in squirrel-cage rotor setting up magnetic poles which create torque; construction of squirrel-cage rotors.

results.title: Elections in Britain
results.brief_description: Outline of the British electoral system, taking the General Election of October 1959 as an example. How the local offices in each constituency prepare for the election. Detailed precautions during the ballot and the subsequent counting to maintain secrecy of the vote.
results.description: Outline of the British electoral system, taking the General Election of October 1959 as an example. How the local offices in each constituency prepare for the election. Detailed precautions during the ballot and the subsequent counting to maintain secrecy of the vote.

results.title: The Elderly are all of us, only a little older
results.creator_credit: Phillip Mark-Law, Don Anderson and Tasmanian Film Corporation
results.brief_description: Looks at the rehousing of elderly people in units with all modern conveniences. Follows the building of the units and the settling in of its new occupants together with their feelings about the move.

results.title: Elder citizen
results.creator_credit: Don Haldane, Grant McLean and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: Cut off from the life in which they once took an active part, many of Canada’s senior citizens find themselves without companionship or security in their declining years. To show how this problem is being met in one corner of Canada, Fred Davis visits Salt Spring Island near Victoria, British Columbia. Here, we find an organized community for senior citizens that offers a full round of activities with some measure of independence. It has come about largely through the efforts of philanthropic property owner Mrs. Winnie Lautman.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Don Haldane, Grant McLean and National Film Board of Canada

results.title: El Barrio
results.creator_credit: Norton Heilig, David Sureck and UNICEF
results.brief_description: Mario Mendoza, age 7, lives in a city dump in Mexico City. We see a day in Mario’s life. The Mexican Government, with aid from UNICEF, plans to help people-like Mario-who are living in such squalid conditions
